alert.note: Alert for Bartow; Chattooga; Floyd; Gordon; Haralson; Pickens; Polk; Walker (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 5:25AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Haralson, Floyd, southeastern Walker, Gordon, Polk, northwestern Pickens, central Chattooga and Bartow Counties through 600 AM EDT... At 524 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Subligna to near Waterhouse to Hokes Bluff, and moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Rome, Cartersville, Calhoun, Cedartown, Summerville, Adairsville, Rockmart, Euharlee, Tallapoosa, Trion, Aragon, Cave Spring, Kingston, Resaca, Plainville, Taylorsville, Shannon, Cassville, Fairmount, and Lyerly. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
